results.title: Global gene expression profiling in mouse plasma cell tumor precursor and bystander cells reveals potential intervention targets for plasma cell neoplasia.
results.text_hl: The latter led to a biologic validation study that showed that the AMPK-activating @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@ drug, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, was a potent specific @<m>DISEASE_Plasmacytoma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010954 @@@PCT@@@ inhibitor in vitro.

citations.NLM: LeGrand J, Park ES, Wang H, Gupta S, Owens JD Jr, Nelson PJ, DuBois W, Bair T, Janz S, Mushinski JF. Global gene expression profiling in mouse plasma cell tumor precursor and bystander cells reveals potential intervention targets for plasma cell neoplasia. Blood. 2012 Jan 26;119(4):1018-28. PMID: 22147894
